rules_text: Create two Junk tokens. [i](They're artifacts with “{T}, Sacrifice this: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]Amidst the solar storm, the mothership's controls failed. It was sent careening towards the ground, alongside its host of satellite ships and numerous other vessels tracking its coordinates.[/i]
